The Dashboard page gives an overview of: The Dashboard page gives an overview of the student's current semester's progress. Includes attendance, performance, strong or weak points, low attendance, and upcoming events.
This Overall Attendance shows the averag: This Overall Attendance shows the average attendance of all the subjects until now.
If the attendance is below 75%, then the: If the attendance is below 75%, then the parent must take action.
This shows the overall percentage of the: This shows the overall percentage of the student based on marks obtained up till now.
If the percentage is below 60%, then the: If the percentage is below 60%, then the parent must take action.
This will be visible only after an exam: This will be visible only after an exam has been conducted otherwise nothing is there to show!
This is an out-of-5 metric that combines: This is an out-of-5 metric that combines current performance and attendance.
It works on the criteria of 60% marks an: It works on the criteria of 60% marks and 40% attendance.
A subject-wise graphical view of how muc: A subject-wise graphical view of how much attendance has been taken in each subject.
A parent can easily see which subject is: A parent can easily see which subject is being neglected by the student and by how much.
It displays the lectures attended and to: It displays the lectures attended and total lectures in each subject.
This shows the marks obtained in all typ: This shows the marks obtained in all types of exams in each subject.
The subjects above 80% are considered st: The subjects above 80% are considered strong subjects.
The subjects below 75% are considered we: The subjects below 75% are considered weak subjects.
Subjects below 75% attendance are consid: Subjects below 75% attendance are considered low attendance subjects.
Action must be taken by the parent to im: Action must be taken by the parent to improve the attendance in that subject.
This shows the upcoming events in the co: This shows the upcoming events in the college including timetables, exams, etc.
The Performance page gives in detail inf: The Performance page gives in detail information about all the past as well as current semester
It includes overall attendance, marks, l: It includes overall attendance, marks, lecture video review, detailed attendance, detailed marks.
This allows parents to select semester: This allows parents to select semester
Data corresponding to that semester will: Data corresponding to that semester will be visible.
It will display the overall attendance f: It will display the overall attendance for all subjects in the selected semester.
It will display the overall percentage o: It will display the overall percentage of marks obtained in all subjects across all exams in the selected semester.
It will highlight the student's particip: It will highlight the student's participation in various extracurricular activities, showcasing their interests and skills outside the classroom.
It provides an overview of the student's: It provides an overview of the student's involvement in clubs, sports, and community events, reflecting their commitment to personal growth and teamwork.
It will display a detailed review of lec: It will display a detailed review of lectures for each subject as well as all subjects, covering each week, month, and the entire duration of the course.
This section offers a comprehensive over: This section offers a comprehensive overview of lecture content and student performance across time.
It will display subject-wise attendance,: It will display subject-wise attendance, including the number of days present, absent, and days with no lecture, for each subject on a weekly, monthly, and overall basis.
This page allows parents to occasionally: This page allows parents to occasionally connect with the current semester's faculty.
The Performance Outlook provides an esti: The Performance Outlook provides an estimate of a student’s future performance based on key academic data.
Based on Attendance and Past Performance: Based on Attendance and Past Performance: Uses current semester attendance, last semester’s percentage, and marks from two semesters ago to estimate performance.
Estimation with Variability: The predict: Estimation with Variability: The prediction can vary based on factors like exam preparation, assignments, and course engagement.
Updated Regularly: The outlook is refres: Updated Regularly: The outlook is refreshed as the semester progresses, ensuring it reflects the student’s most current data.
Considers factors such as: Students' ana: Considers factors such as: Students' analysis of teachers, Lecture timing and type of lectures, Day of the week.
Analyzes attendance patterns from previo: Analyzes attendance patterns from previous weeks.
Predicts the likelihood of a student's p: Predicts the likelihood of a student's presence for the upcoming timetable.
Estimation is based on available data an: Estimation is based on available data and may vary.
